pr_title: Map new GameRule methods and EditGameRulesScreen

timeline.message: Map new GameRule methods and EditGameRulesScreen

timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, isn't a tooltip already a description? mind elaborate on this field?
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			ARG 4 rule
          
          
            
            			ARG 3 ruleName
          
          
            
            			ARG 4 rule
          
      
    
    
  

(assuming arg 3 is the rule name)

replies.bodyText: I've seen both thrown around, would be nice if we standardized on a name
replies.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: If it is a fraction between 0.0 and 1.0 for lerping a value between the last tick and present tick value, then it's tickDelta. If it is not tick related then just delta
replies.author: liach
